channel.title: 12 characters in someone's name MAX
channel.description:
Well, I used to know how to do this, but over the time, I forgot..
So, as a lot of people are introduced to cheat clients, they use names like.. "rofl 3823 829398r2893rj23 23r9q8a23jf" etc. etc.
I remember there was something you add in the client.java to stop this.
Discuss.

item.title: 12 characters in someone's name MAX
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

This would go under the login method.

if(playerName.length > 12){
    returncode = 7;
    disconnected = true;
}

And place this conditional in the saveGame method:
playerName.length <= 12[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2009, 03:02:05 pm[/size][hr]As for your other question, look for an array called validChars in your Client class. Just remove the digits and the space.

Read full topic
